getKduExtractCommand

public final java.lang.String getKduExtractCommand(java.lang.String input,
                                                   java.lang.String output,
                                                   java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> dims,
                                                   DjatokaDecodeParam params)
Gets Kdu Extract Command-line based on dims and params

Parameters:
input - absolute file path of JPEG 2000 image file.
output - absolute file path of PGM output image
dims - array of region parameters (i.e. y,x,h,w)
params - contains rotate and level extraction information
Returns:
command line string to extract region using kdu_extract
